name: Psychic Bounder
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Jinzo" or 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists that card in its text, from your Deck to your hand. When another monster you control is attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: You can destroy both the attacking monster and this card. You can only use each effect of "Psychic Bounder" once per turn.
